column2: "Na metsee ndze kɛse bi a ofi asɔrdan no mu rese abɔfo beesuon no dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ nkohue Nyankopɔn n’ebufuw nkɔɔpow esuon no ngu asaase do."

column2: "Na dza odzi kan no kɔree kohuee no kɔɔpow guu asaase do
column3: na ɔdaan kur mpɔtɔwee a ɔyɛ yaw wɔ nyimpa a wɔwɔ abowa no ne nsewhyɛ
column4: na wɔkotoow no honyi no do."

column2: "Na dza otsia ebien no huee no kɔɔpow guu po mu
column3: na ɔdaan dɛ owufo bɔgyaa; na dza ɔwɔ po no mu a ɔtse ase biara wui."

column2: "Na dza otsia ebiasa no huee no kɔɔpow guu esutsen nye nsunyiwa do
"Na metsee dɛ esu bɔfo no rese dɛ
column3: Ɔtseneneenyi nye ɔwo a ewɔ hɔ

column2: "osiandɛ wohuee ahotseweefo nye nkɔnhyɛfo no bɔgyaa gui
column3: na ama hɔn bɔgya dɛ wɔnnom: Dɛm na ɔfata hɔn!"

column2: "Na metsee ndze bi so fi afɔrmbukyia no mu se dɛ
"Na dza otsia anan no huee no kɔɔpow guu ewia do; na wɔmaa no ahoɔdzen dɛ ɔmfa gya nhyehye nyimpa."
"Na wɔdze ɔhyew kɛse hyehyee nyimpa: na wɔkaa Nyankopɔn a ɔwɔ tum wɔ dɛm mbusuhaw yi do no ne dzin ho ebususɛm na woennu hɔnho annhyɛ no enyimnyam."
"Na dza otsia enum no huee no kɔɔpow guu abowa no n’ahengua no do; na n’ahenman yɛɛ sum; na ɔyaw no ntsi wɔkekaa hɔn tɛkyerɛma
"na wɔkaa sor Nyankopɔn ho ebususɛm
column3: wɔ hɔn yaw nye hɔn ekur no ntsi; na woennu hɔnho emmfi hɔn ndwuma mu."

column2: "Na dza otsia esia no huee no kɔɔpow guu esutsen kɛse Eufrates mu; na no mu nsu wewee
column3: ama woeesiesie kwan ama ahemfo a wofi wipuei no."

column2: "Na muhun esunsum fi ebiasa a wɔtse dɛ ntwɛr fi sasabɔnsam no anomu
"na wɔyɛ mbɔnsam esunsum a wɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛdze
column3: na wopue kɔ wiadze nyina ahemfo hɔ

column2: "(Hwɛ
column3: mereba dɛ owifo. Nhyira nye onyia ɔweɔn
column5: amma ɔaanantsew adagyaw mu na woeennhu n’ahoto.)"

column2: "Na wɔboaboaa hɔn ano kɔr beebi a wɔfrɛ no Hebriw kasa mu Harmagedon."
"Na dza otsia esuon no huee no kɔɔpow guu ehum enyi; na ndze kɛse bi fi asɔrdan no mu ahengua no do bae dɛ
"Na enyinam
column4: nye asenaman bae; na asaasewosow kɛse bi bae a ofitsi ber a nyimpa baa asaase do wonnhun bi pɛn
column5: asaasewosow kɛse a ɔyɛ dzen a."

column2: "Na kurow kɛse no mu paa afaafa ebiasa
column3: na amanamamfo nkurow hwehwee ase: na wɔkaa Babilɔn kɛse no wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim
column4: dɛ wɔbɛma no n’ebufuw a ɔyɛ hyew no no wenyin kɔɔpow."

column2: "Na nsupruw nyina guanguanee
"Na ɔsorbo a kor no dur bɛyɛ kyɛpɛn kɛse kor
column3: fi sor bɔhwehwee nyimpa do: na nyimpa kasaa Nyankopɔn ho ebususɛm
column4: wɔ ɔsorbo no ne haw ntsi: osiandɛ ne haw no so kɛse."
